note.item: Set z-index for leaflet map in field to 1, so that it is behind most sticky headers.
Add an example for an custom form in agosms component.
Add an database columns created_by and modified_by with dates.
Add uniqueid to alias, if alias already in use.
Add static code to addressfinder, that he only works in europe. This should be setting dynamicly in futher.
Module agosms: Add option that link to agoms item is shown in popup.
Many small improvments and fixes in agosms component.
Add column text to support Plugin Shariff.
